data.text: @WHYDNA8 The Strokes at least flat out admitted it- even the guitar solo is fairly similar
@WHYDNA8 It’s fairly common, but I’m not so sure that Sam Smith one is a mere coincidence- it’s really exactly the same, just a bit slower tempo

@SilasUnderFire We actually talked about this when we did special podcast after Tom Petty died, I knew about the Strokes back then but not the Sam Smith part (The Strokes have acknowledged they stole the song, while Sam Smith was sued by Jeff Lynne who co wrote Back Down)
@TMillo I don’t think Petty ever got a writing credit for “Last Nite” but he did with “Stay with Me”
@TMillo Afterwards though, Sam Smith got sued by the co writer of “I won’t back down”
